"Ice Cube Tray with Built-In Compartments for Different Beverages" - An ice cube tray with separate compartments for different beverages, such as coffee, tea, and water. Each compartment would have its own insulation to keep the beverage at the appropriate temperature. This would be perfect for families or offices that have multiple people with different drink preferences. Confidence score: 0.8

"Ice Cube Tray with Built-in Blender" - An ice cube tray with a built-in blender that can blend ingredients right into the ice cubes. This would be perfect for making smoothies, frozen cocktails, or even frozen coffee. Confidence score: 0.7

"Ice Cube Tray with Built-in Heater" - An ice cube tray with a built-in heater that can heat up the ice cubes to the desired temperature. This would be perfect for making hot drinks like tea or cocoa, or for keeping cocktails at the perfect temperature. Confidence score: 0.6

"Ice Cube Tray with Built-in Charger" - An ice cube tray with a built-in charger that can charge multiple devices at once. This would be perfect for keeping your phone, tablet, and other devices charged while you're on the go. Confidence score: 0.5
